Sentencas: This paper proposes a new control and power management strategy for a grid-connected microgrid, which includes a hybrid renewable energy sources (HRES) system and a three-phase load.
Titulo: A novel control strategy and power management of hybrid PV/FC/SC/battery renewable power system-based grid-connected microgrid

Sentencas: The HRES system consists of a photovoltaic (PV), a battery storage system (BSS), a super-capacitor (SC) and a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: A novel control strategy and power management of hybrid PV/FC/SC/battery renewable power system-based grid-connected microgrid

Sentencas: The dynamic model of each of these units is described.
Titulo: A novel control strategy and power management of hybrid PV/FC/SC/battery renewable power system-based grid-connected microgrid

Sentencas: The PV is the main energy source, while the SC and the BSS due to their various power densities are considered to provide a steady and transient load demand, respectively.
Titulo: A novel control strategy and power management of hybrid PV/FC/SC/battery renewable power system-based grid-connected microgrid

Sentencas: For increasing the reliability of the system, SOFC source is selected to keep the BSS completely charged.
Titulo: A novel control strategy and power management of hybrid PV/FC/SC/battery renewable power system-based grid-connected microgrid

Sentencas: All these units with different DC-DC converters are connected in parallel to a common DC bus.
Titulo: A novel control strategy and power management of hybrid PV/FC/SC/battery renewable power system-based grid-connected microgrid

Sentencas: Then, a three-phase voltage source inverter (VSI) is employed to convert the DC voltage to AC.
Titulo: A novel control strategy and power management of hybrid PV/FC/SC/battery renewable power system-based grid-connected microgrid

Sentencas: To maintain the power balance and appropriate load-sharing, an adaptive fractional fuzzy sliding mode control (AFFSMC) strategy for VSI-based HRES system is presented.
Titulo: A novel control strategy and power management of hybrid PV/FC/SC/battery renewable power system-based grid-connected microgrid

Sentencas: The controller is able to track the pre-defined instruction precisely and quickly in the microgrid.
Titulo: A novel control strategy and power management of hybrid PV/FC/SC/battery renewable power system-based grid-connected microgrid

Sentencas: For stable performance of the control strategy under load variation, a fractional order-based sliding surface is considered.
Titulo: A novel control strategy and power management of hybrid PV/FC/SC/battery renewable power system-based grid-connected microgrid

Sentencas: Moreover, fractional adaptive rules-based fuzzy sets are employed to accurately estimate the uncertain parameters in the microgrid.
Titulo: A novel control strategy and power management of hybrid PV/FC/SC/battery renewable power system-based grid-connected microgrid

Sentencas: The simulation results demonstrate the effectiveness and capability of an AFFSMC strategy under various faults and different loading conditions.
Titulo: A novel control strategy and power management of hybrid PV/FC/SC/battery renewable power system-based grid-connected microgrid

Sentencas: Moreover, the proposed control strategy is compared with the conventional PI controller.
Titulo: A novel control strategy and power management of hybrid PV/FC/SC/battery renewable power system-based grid-connected microgrid
